PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(G) -亿城英语 ... grindstone 旋转磨石 gringo 外国佬 grinningly 露齿.
...去对付毒枭,他们只会做成更多无辜人死亡! 他又说你美国佬(gringo)要打击毒品, 你在你自己边境上搅呀, 我们国家从来没有过严重的.
...卫之一，而且在历经波折之后，重新回到了西班牙联赛。 他的昵称是“格林戈（gringo）”（Gringo），他向我们讲诉了皇马的目标以及他在英超 …

list.abs: Old Gringo 乱世夕阳情 1989 Old Gun, The 誓不两立 1980 Oliver and Company 老友记闯天涯 1990 Omen IV: The Awakening 末日撒旦 1992 On Deadly Ground.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Spanish, literally foreign, foreigner, or gibberish'

entry.tran: 外国佬，（尤指）美国佬，英国佬（拉美人用语，可能具冒犯意味）
entry.def: Gringo is sometimes used by people from Latin America to refer to people from other countries, especially the United States and Britain. This word could cause offence.

means.word_mean: 1. a Latin American (disparaging) term for foreigners (especially Americans and Englishmen)

auth_sentence.content: Now Hoover was receiving reports of a wild gringo up in the mountains.
